alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 12:48PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1248 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coral Terrace, or near South Miami, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Miami Beach, Coral Gables, South Miami, Surfside, Miami Gardens, North Miami, Doral, North Miami Beach, Aventura, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Hialeah Gardens, Sunny Isles Beach, Opa-Locka, West Park and Miami Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
